frameDefinitions: A Cognizer calls up an episodic memory of past Experience or an Impression of a Salient_entity formed  on the basis of past experience.
A Resource is depleted by some process, resulting in there being only a Remainder in existence some time into or after the process.
The Denoted_quantity is (generally) an imprecise characterization of the quantity of Individuals or a Mass, made with reference to a relatively easily and precisely imaginable Reference_quantity.
An Agent behaves as if they were a particular individual or type of Simulated_entity with the intent of misleading observers of their behavior.
A Process of using or modifying is scheduled to be applied to a group or mass.
An Item is located on a Scale relative to a critical value which is determined by some Enabled_situation.
frameExamples: Kozmo could <t>remember</t> when his modem was the fastest he could buy.
There are only two poems <t>left</t> from Quayle
It took <t><fex name='Denoted_quantity'>about</fex></t> three hours, but we 're done now.
The belfast bank robbers <t>posed</t> as police.
Three more cars <t>remain</t> to be fixed.
listRoleDefinitions: A person who recalls memories of past experience or impressions.
A person or thing that the <fen>Cognizer</fen> remembers as being involved in some state or event or as having some property.
A past event or state that the <fen>Cognizer</fen> witnessed and is now recalling. The <fen>Experience</fen> may be a specific event or state or a vaguer period that is treated as a unit.

A property that the <fen>Cognizer</fen> attributes to the <fen>Salient_entity</fen> based on their past experience of the <fen>Salient_entity</fen> or a category to which the <fen>Salient_entity</fen> is assigned.
A property or role that a <fen>Salient_entity</fen> actually held and which frames the memories that the <fen>Cognizer</fen> has of the <fen>Salient_entity</fen>.
The time when the <fen>Cognizer</fen> remembers the experience.
The part of the Resource that the Process has not yet applied to.
The original set of items to which the Depletive_process applies one after the other.
The individual who owned the Resource that is being depleted.

A temporal setting or event which metonymically stands for the entities that were in existence then. The <fen>Remainder</fen> is part of the <fen>Original_context</fen>. This role occurs especially when abstract entities such as social institutions are seen as <fen>Resource</fen>s.
The Time when the amount of the Resource that is let is assessed.
The quantity denoted by phrases headed by the Target.
A substance that is being quantified.
A collection of entities, either quantifiable physical beings (e.g. <m>toads</m>) or quantifiable units whether physical or not (e.g. <m>dollars</m>).
A relatively precise quantity in some oft-used form that is used as the basis for defining the <fen>Denoted_quantity</fen>.
The <fen>Agent</fen> is the person who acts in a misleading way to create the impression that they are a particular individual or type of <fen>Simulated_entity</fen>.
The type or individual that the <fen>Agent</fen> gives the impression of being.
The time at which the <fen>Agent</fen> impersonates the <fen>Simulated_entity</fen>.
The location where the <fen>Agent</fen> gives the impression that they are the <fen>Simulated_entity</fen>.
The activity that is being applied to the mass or the set of entities.
The mass or group that has not yet been processed.
The time when the <fen>Remainder</fen> is assessed.
The entity whose scalar property is specified.
The <fen>Scale</fen> is the attribute of the <fen>Item</fen> that is being described.
This role identifies the <fen>Enabled_situation</fen> by which the critical value is judged.
listRoleExamples: I will truly miss Delmar and <fex>I</fex> will always remember when his eyes lit up everytime he got ice-cream.
today I saw a sister's exclassmate, and didn't recognise him, I remember <fex>him</fex> taller.
I can still remember <fex>saying the pledge every morning before class in elementary school</fex>, a rare occurrence among elementary school kids nowadays.
I remember Peter <fex>as immensely kind in those first three weeks before I was packed off to boarding school</fex>.
Atulprasad is principally remembered <fex>as a musician and composer</fex>.
Only two poems are left <fex>from Virgil Smithers</fex>
Only the Beaux Arts cinema is left <fex>from the golden era of the 1940s</fex>
<fex>In 1910</fex>, only two of the Renaissance buildings remained
An additional eighty-three invitations remain <fex>to be sent</fex>
In this case everyone should be informed by word of mouth to contact the person holding the list to find out <fex>which gifts</fex> still remain to be bought.
<fex>Now</fex> only three more items remain to be sold
It was <fex>hot</fex> enough to ignite the iron.
Can He make a rock too heavy <fex>for Him to lift</fex>?
